GK19bhall_pu:156: yeṣām aśeṣabhuvanābharaṇasya hemnas tattvaṃ vivektum upalāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇam // Bhall_73 //
GK19bhall_pu:158: saṃrakṣituṃ kṛṣim akāri kṛṣīvalena paśyātmanaḥ pratikṛtis tṛṇapūruṣo 'yam
GK19bhall_pu:159: stabdhasya niṣkriyatayāstabhiyo 'sya nūnam aśnanti gomṛgagaṇāḥ pura eva sasyam // Bhall_74
GK19bhall_pu:160: kasyānimeṣanayane vidite divauko- lokād ṛte jagati te api vai gṛhītvā /
GK19bhall_pu:161: piṇḍaprasāritamukhena time kim etad dṛṣṭaṃ na bāliśa viśad baḍiśaṃ tvayāntaḥ // Bhall_75 //
GK19bhall_pu:162: puṃstvād api pravicaled yadi yady adho 'pi yāyād yadi praṇayane na mahān api syāt /
GK19bhall_pu:163: abhyuddharet tad api viśvam itīdṛśīyaṃ kenāpi dik prakaṭitā puruṣottamena
GK19bhall_pu:164: svālpāśayaḥ svakulaśilpavikalpam eva yaḥ kalpayan skhalati kācavaṇik piśācaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:167: tatpratyarthitayā vṛto na tu kṛtaḥ samyak svatantro bhayāt svasthas tān na nipātayed iti yathākāmaṃ na sampoṣitaḥ* /
GK19bhall_pu:168: saṃśuṣyan pṛṣadaṃśa eṣa kurutāṃ mūkaḥ sthito 'py atra kiṃ gehe kiṃ bahunā 'dhunā gṛhapateś caurrāś caranty ākhavaḥ // Bhall_78 //
GK19bhall_pu:170: evaṃ cet sarasasvabhāvamahimā jāḍyaṃ kim etādṛśaṃ yady eṣā ca nisargataḥ sarasatā kiṃ granthimattedṛśī
GK19bhall_pu:171: mūlaṃ cec chucipaṅkajaśrutir iyaṃ kasmād guṇā yady amī kiṃ chidrāṇimṛṇāla bhavatas tattvaṃ na manyāmahe // Bhall_79 //
GK19bhall_pu:172: ye digdhveva kṛtā viṣeṇa kusṛtir yeṣāṃ kiyad bhaṇyate lokaṃ hantum anāgasaṃ dvirasanā randhreṣu ye jāgrati /
GK19bhall_pu:173: vyālās te 'pi dadhaty amī sadasator mūḍhā maṇīn mūrdhabhir naucityād guṇaśalināṃ kva cid api bhraṃśo 'sty alaṃ cintayā // Bhall_80 //
GK19bhall_pu:174: aho strīṇāṃ krauryaṃ hatarajani dhik tvām atiśaṭhe vṛthāprakrānteyaṃ timirakabarīviślathadhṛtiḥ
GK19bhall_pu:175: avaktavye pāte jananayananāthasya śaśinaḥ kṛtaṃ snehasyāntocitam udadhimukhyair nanu jaḍaiḥ aho gehenardī divasavijigīṣājvararujā pradīpo 'yaṃ sthāne glapayati mṛṣāmūn avayavān /
GK19bhall_pu:176: udāttasvacchandākramaṇahṛtaviśvasya tamasaḥ parispandaṃ draṣṭuṃ mukham api ca kiṃ soḍham amunā nāmāpy anyataror nimīlitam abhūt tat tāvad unmīlitaṃ prasthāne skhalataḥ svavartmani vidher apy udgṛhītaḥ karaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:177: lokaś cāyam aniṣṭadarśanakṛtād dṛgvaiśasān mocito yuktaṃ kāṣṭhika lūnavān yad asi tām āmrālim ākālikīm // Bhall_83 //
GK19bhall_pu:178: vātāhāratayā jagadviṣadharair āśvāsya niḥśeṣitaṃ te grastāḥ punar abhratoyakaṇikātīvravratair barhibhiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:179: te 'pi krūracamūrucarmavasanair nītāḥ kṣayaṃ lubdhakair dambhasya sphuritaṃ vidann api jano jālmo guṇanīhate // Bhall_84 //
GK19bhall_pu:180: ūḍhā yena mahādhuraḥ suviṣame mārge sadaikākinā soḍho yena kadā cid eva na nije goṣṭhe 'nyaśauṇḍadhvaniḥ
GK19bhall_pu:181: āsīd yas tu gavāṃ gaṇasya tilakas tasyaiva sampraty aho dhik kaṣṭaṃ dhavalasya jātajaraso goḥ paṇyam udghoṣyate // Bhall_85 //
GK19bhall_pu:182: asthānodyogaduḥkhaṃ jahihi na hi nabhaḥ paṅgusaṃcārayogyaṃ svāyāsāyaiva sādho tava śalabha javābhyāsadurvāsaneyam /
GK19bhall_pu:185: candreṇaiva taraṅgabhaṅgimukharaṃ saṃvardhyamānāmbhaso dadyur jīvitam eva kiṃ girisaritsrotāṃsi yady ambudheḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:186: teṣv eva pratisaṃvidhānavikalaṃ paśyatsu sākṣiṣv iva drāg darpoddhuram āgateṣv api na sa kṣīyeta yady anyathā // Bhall_87 //
GK19bhall_pu:187: kilaikaculukena yo munir apāram abdhiṃ papau sahasram api ghasmaro
GK19bhall_pu:189: na sambhavati kiṃ tv idaṃ bata vikāsidhāmnā vinā sad apy asad iva sthitaṃ sphuritam anta ojasvinām grāvāṇo 'tra vibhūṣaṇaṃ trijagato maryādayā sthīyate nanv atraiva vidhuḥ sthito hi vibudhāḥ sambhūya pūrṇāśiṣaḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:190: śete codgatanābhipadmavilasadbrahmeha devaḥ svayaṃ daivād eti jaḍaḥ svakukṣibhrtaye so 'py ambudhir nimnatām // Bhall_89 //
GK19bhall_pu:191: anīrṣyā śrotāro mama vacasi ced vacmi tad ahaṃ svapakṣād bhetavyaṃ na tu bahu vipakṣāt prabhavataḥ
GK19bhall_pu:192: tamasy ākrāntāśe kiyad api hi tejo 'vayavinaḥ svaśaktyā bhānty ete
GK19bhall_pu:193: divasakṛti saty eva na punaḥ // Bhall_90 //
GK19bhall_pu:194: etat tasya mukhāt kiyat kamalinīpatre kaṇaṃ vāriṇo yan muktāmaṇir ity amaṃsta sa jaḍaḥ śṛṇvan yad asmād api /
GK19bhall_pu:195: aṅgulyagralaghukriyāpravilayiny ādīyamāne śanaiḥ kutroḍḍīyagato mamety anudinaṃ nidrāti nāntaḥśucā āste 'traiva sarasy aho bata kiyān saṃtoṣapakṣagraho haṃsasyāsya manāṅ na dhāvati manaḥ śrīdhāmni padme kva cit /
GK19bhall_pu:196: supto 'dyāpi na budhyate tad itarāṃs tāvat pratīkṣāmahe velām ity udaraṃpriyā madhulihaḥ soḍhuṃ kṣaṇaṃ na kṣamāḥ // Bhall_92 //
GK19bhall_pu:197: bhekena kvaṇatā saroṣaparuṣaṃ yat kṛṣṇasarpānane dātuṃ gaṇḍacapetam ujjhitabhiyā hastaḥ samullāsitaḥ
GK19bhall_pu:198: yac cādhomukham akṣiṇī pidadhatā nāgena tatra sthitaṃ tat sarvaṃ viṣamantriṇo bhagavataḥ kasyāpi līlāyitam // Bhall_93 //
GK19bhall_pu:199: mṛtyor āsyam ivātataṃ dhanur idaṃ cāśīviṣābhāḥ śarāḥ śikṣā sāpi jitārjunaprabhrtikā sarvatra nimnā gatiḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:200: antaḥ krauryam aho śaṭhasya madhuraṃ hā hāri geyaṃ mukhe vyādhasyāsya yathā bhaviṣyati tathā manye vanaṃ nrimṛgam // Bhall_94 //
GK19bhall_pu:201: ko 'yaṃ bhrāntiprakāras tava pavana padaṃ lokapādāhatīnāṃ tejasvivrātasevye nabhasi nayasi yat pāṃsupūraṃ pratiṣṭhām /
GK19bhall_pu:202: yasminn utthāpyamāne jananayanapathopadravas tāvad āstāṃ kenopāyena sādhyo vapuṣi kaluṣatādoṣa eṣa tvayaiva // Bhall_95 //
GK19bhall_pu:203: ete te vijigīṣavo nṛpagṛhadvārārpitāvekṣaṇāḥ kṣipyante vasuyācanāhitadhiyaḥ kopoddhatair vetribhiḥ
GK19bhall_pu:204: arthebhyo viṣayopabhogavirasair nākāri yair ādaras te tiṣṭhanti manasvinaḥ surasarittīre manohāriṇi vātā vāntu kadambareṇuśabalā nṛtyantu sarpadviṣaḥ sotsāhā navatoyabhāraguravo muñcantu nādaṃ ghanāḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:205: magnāṃ kāntaviyogaduḥkhadahane māṃ vīkṣya dīnānanāṃ vidyut kiṃ sphurasi tvam apy akaruṇe strītve 'pi tulye sati // Bhall_97 //
GK19bhall_pu:206: prāṇā yena samarpitās tava balād yenaivam utthāpitaḥ skandhe yena ciraṃ dhṛto 'si vidadhe yas te saparyām api /
GK19bhall_pu:207: tasyāntah smitamātrakeṇa janayañ jīvāpahāraṃ kṣaṇād bhrātaḥ pratyupakāriṇāṃ dhuri paraṃ vetālalīlāyase rajjvā diśaḥ pravitatāḥ salilaṃ viṣeṇa khātā mahī hutabhujā jvalitā vanāntāḥ /
GK19bhall_pu:208: vyādhā padāny anusaranti gṛhītacāpāḥ kaṃ deśam āśrayatu yūthapatir mṛgāṇām
GK19bhall_pu:209: ayaṃ vārām eko nilaya iti ratnākara iti śrito 'smābhis
GK19bhall_pu:211: ka evaṃ jānīte nijakarapuṭīkoṭaragataṃ kṣaṇād enaṃ tāmyattiminikaram āpāsyati muniḥ // Bhall_100
GK19bhall_pu:212: viśālaṃ śālmalyā nayanasubhagaṃ vīkṣya kusumaṃ śukasyāsīd buddhiḥ phalam api bhaved asya sadṛśam
GK19bhall_pu:213: cirāsīnaṃ tasmiṃś ca phalam api daivāt pariṇataṃ vipāke tūlo 'ntaḥ sapadi marutā so 'py apahṛtaḥ sarvaprajāhitakṛte puruṣottamasya vāse samastavibudhaprathiteṣṭasiddhau /
GK19bhall_pu:214: candrāṃśuvṛndavitatadyutim aty amuṣmin- he kālakūṭa tava janma kathaṃ payodhau // Bhall_102
GK19bhall_pu:216: chāyārthī kaḥ paśur api bhavati jaradvīrudhāṃ praṇayī // Bhall_103 //
